meanings.definition: The state or process of developing something before it is fully formed or realized.
meanings.sent1: The predevelopments of the new product were crucial for its success.
meanings.sent2: The team discussed the predevelopments of the project during the meeting.
meanings.sent3: The predevelopments of the cake recipe included adding extra sugar for sweetness.
meanings.sent4: Her sketches were the predevelopments of the masterpiece she later painted.
meanings.sent5: The predevelopments of the garden layout made it easier to visualize the final design.

meanings.definition: Things that have been developed or planned in advance.
meanings.sent1: The predevelopments for the event ensured everything ran smoothly.
meanings.sent2: The predevelopments of the neighborhood included parks and schools.
meanings.sent3: The predevelopments of the surprise party were kept secret from the birthday girl.
meanings.sent4: His predevelopments in chess strategy helped him win the tournament.
meanings.sent5: The predevelopments of the marketing campaign were well-received by the target audience.
